name: chicagoan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US city of Chicago: It's so nice to meet another Chicagoan! The restaurant was popular among young Chicagoans.
More examplesFewer examplesI came to Chicago on business and met a native Chicagoan.A former Chicagoan, he now lives in Johannesburg, South Africa.She is a native Arabic speaker and a proud Chicagoan.I'm a second-generation Polish Chicagoan.Even if the building is renamed, getting Chicagoans to roll with it will be another matter.
